WorkItem.ClosedComment: I've fixed this locally but have not checked in. Please don't build WPF until a commit that says its ready is posted
WorkItem.Description:

Comments.Message:
I was able to get past this by copying all the xml files in:
  Rawr4/Rawr.Silverlight.Web/ClientBin/
to
  Rawr4/Rawr.WPF/bin/Debug/

If the files are not present, Rawr tries to get them from "http://wowrawr.com/ClientBin/DefaultDataFiles.zip" which does not appear to exist.
Yes, that's a remnant of Rawr3, we'll have to change that to either pull from EJ or Rawr4.
